name: @kailashAppDev/figma-mcp-toolkit
description: Integrate Figma's powerful design capabilities into your applications. Leverage the MCP server to interact with Figma's API seamlessly and enhance your workflows. Simplify your design processes by connecting Figma with other tools and services effortlessly.

tools.name: extract-components
tools.description: Extract all components from Figma file and get all graphql queries and mutations

tools.name: extract-latest-components
tools.description: Extract newly added components from Figma file

tools.name: extract-one-component
tools.description: Extract a single component from Figma file
